org.apache.spark.mllib.tree.impurity

Class GiniCalculator

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.mllib.tree.impurity.ImpurityCalculator
      • org.apache.spark.mllib.tree.impurity.GiniCalculator

  • public class GiniCalculator
extends ImpurityCalculator
    Stores statistics for one (node, feature, bin) for calculating impurity. Unlike GiniAggregator, this class stores its own data and is for a specific (node, feature, bin).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors
